author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7.  Heat the oil in an ovenproof pan. Add the potatoes, garlic and thyme and saut√© for eight minutes, to colour golden brown on all sides. Transfer to the oven for five minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the oven and serve with a sprinkling of salt.
ingredients: 1 potato, cut into 6 long chips,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  1 sprig fresh thyme
